categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones actors

nodes.text: Daniel Zizmor is a storyboard and previsualization artist for Star Wars: The Clone Wars, a CGI-based television series that debuted October 3, 2008 on Cartoon Network as a continuation of the film with the same name, released 2 months prior.

Zizmor was also a layout artist for Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith and worked in the visual effects department for Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. While at ILM, he played Kit Fisto in numerous scenes in Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones.
